title: Implementing data science in healthcare
summary: I recently wrote a blogpost for datascience.com, which you can find here. It’s about some of the lessons I’ve learned on actually implementing data science projects in healthcare for clinicians. It isn’t about the technical side of things, but the challenges of actually making sure your …
content: I recently wrote a blogpost for datascience.com, which you can find here. It’s about some of the lessons I’ve learned on actually implementing data science projects in healthcare for clinicians. It isn’t about the technical side of things, but the challenges of actually making sure your project is actually useful and fits into the workflows of clinicians.
